entries.title: Runtime authority and admin boundaries clarified
entries.summary: Documented the two-repo architecture with the runtime as the sole authority, a privileged local WinForms admin, and a downstream read-only web dashboard consumer.
details: Clarified the runtime as the authoritative source of state, snapshots, and control.
Confirmed the WinForms Desktop Admin as the privileged local control plane with filesystem/process access.
Documented the web dashboard as a downstream reader of exported JSON with no control authority.
Noted ongoing path configuration groundwork and reiterated no breaking runtime behavior changes in this release.

entries.title: Alpha metadata corrected
entries.summary: Captured the v0.2.2-alpha metadata refresh while keeping prior runtime records at their original versions.
details: Logged the late-alpha metadata sweep across public and dashboard surfaces without altering history.
Preserved December runtime entries at v0.2.1-alpha for audit continuity.
Clarified this change is documentation-only and does not enable runtime execution.

entries.title: Runtime development resumed
entries.summary: Runtime execution resumed with Rumble paused and YouTube/Twitch prioritized for ingestion.
details: Explicit platform state tracking introduced (ACTIVE, PAUSED, DISABLED).
Rumble marked as PAUSED with telemetry preserved and scheduler skip logic.
YouTube and Twitch stabilized for continued chat ingestion development.

entries.title: Runtime development suspended
entries.summary: Runtime execution and ingestion development has been suspended.
details: External platform interfaces failed to provide stable, supportable ingestion paths.
Runtime behavior could not be made deterministic enough for safe automation.
No further runtime changes are planned until external conditions materially change.

entries.title: Quota enforcement hardened
entries.summary: Daily quota enforcement stabilized across platforms.
